name: Hossein Valamanesh
biography:
Born 1949 Tehran, Iran; lives and works in Adelaide.
Valamanesh graduated from the School of Fine Art Painting in Tehran in 1970 and emigrated to Australia in 1973. Since graduating from further studies at South Australian School of Art he has exhibited frequently in Australia and internationally, including in Germany, Poland and Japan. He has received numerous awards including a Fellowship Residency in Kunstlerhaus Bethanien, Berlin, 1991, and more recently an Australia Council Fellowship. Hossein's work is included in most major public Australian art collections.
